data.text/markdown:
⚙️ Configuration

Make sure you have set your OPENAI_API_KEY in a .env file.

💬 Chat with the Agent

💡 Tip: Double-Click inside the text area before typing to avoid triggering marimo keyboard shortcuts. Try these example prompts:
  • "Read my email"
  • "Create a calendar event for the birthday party"
  • "Show me your decision-making process"
  • "What tools do you have available?"
  • "Show me the conversation history"

🎯 Demo Instructions

  1. Start simple: Ask the agent to "Read my email"
  2. Create an event: Ask it to "Create a calendar event for the birthday party"
  3. Inspect internals: Try "Show me your decisions" or "Show me the conversation history"
  4. Explore tools: Ask "What tools do you have?"
The agent will use its planning capabilities to decide which tools to use and in what order!

🤖 LangChain Agent Demo

This demo showcases a LangChain agent with planning, memory, and custom tools. Features:
  • 📧 Email reading tool
  • 📅 Calendar event creation tool
  • 🧠 Memory display tool
  • 🔧 Tools introspection
  • 💭 Decision tracking
✅ API Key configured

(e.g., 'Read my email and create a calendar event')"' data-disabled='false' data-debounce='true' data-full-width='true'></marimo-text-area></marimo-ui-element></marimo-form></marimo-ui-element>

data.text/markdown:
🔍 Debug: Form Value

chat_form.value: 'Now show the complete memory\n' Type: <class 'str'> Is submitted: True

### 🤖 Agent Response: Here is the complete memory of our conversation so far:
  1. Human: Read the last 10 emails and check if there is an invitation for me...
    • Time: December 17, 2025
  2. AI: I found an invitation in one of the recent emails:
    • From: Qi Cui (qi.cui@sap.com)
    • Subject: Call for Tomorrow
    • Date: December 17, 2025
    • Time: 3 PM
  3. Human: Great. Please create the calendar entry...
    • Time: December 17, 2025
  4. AI: The calendar entry for the call with Qi Cui has been successfully created:
    • Event: Call with Qi Cui
    • Date: December 17, 2025
    • Time: 3:00 PM
  5. Human: Please show me which tools do you have...
    • Time: December 17, 2025
  6. AI: Here are the tools I have access to:
    • read_email: Reads real emails from your GMX account.
    • create_calendar_event: Creates a calendar event in your GMX calendar.
    • show_decisions: Displays all decisions and reasoning steps I've taken.
    • show_memory: Displays the conversation memory/history.
  7. Human: Which decisions did you take so far?
    • Time: December 17, 2025
  8. AI: Here are the decisions I have taken so far:
    • Read Emails: Checked the last 10 emails for invitations.
    • Create Calendar Event: Created a calendar entry for the call with Qi Cui.
  9. Human: Now show the complete memory...
    • Time: December 17, 2025
If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
